title: Passing by
text: I have got to say the best service and curry we have had in sevenoaks x we were lucky to get a table and they would do anything for you x friendly and polite x thanks for making our evening relaxing x see you any soon x

title: Sunday lunch
text: We are going to say this is going to be our number place for Sunday roast x it's a must friendly staff with a fabulous atmosphere x food was freshly cooked large portions and the best roast potatoes ever x lots of fresh veg x next time I'm going to try something different on the menu x looking forward to coming back soon x

title: Holiday
text: A lovely hotel in the centre x just a short walk to the resturants and bars and close to a fabulous beach x The breakfast was nice and also a good cup of tea and coffee with fresh juice x our room was a good size and was cleaned everyday with fresh towels and a nice touch folding my pj's x thanks x had a fridge in the room and liquid soap which was nice x a lovely roof top to chill and watch the sun go down x all the staff were extremely friendly and helpful I would definitely staff here again thanks for making our stay special x

title: Pizza
text: A cosy little spot to watch the sun go down xx friendly staff and fabulous service x comfy seats infront of beach x was my favourite spot to watch the world go by xx just chill chill chill xx

title: Cocktails
text: Lovely spot to watch the sun go down x fabulous cocktails and friendly service xx a must resturant to visit we didn't eat here but the food looked good xx

title: Our favourite place
text: We enjoyed lunch and dinner in this relaxing pub x the food was hot and delicious and I must say they do a fabulous margarita x all the staff are extremely friendly and always have a smile on their face x relaxing music x toilets are clean x we would definitely recommend this pub for a safe pair of hands for drinks and food for all travellers x thanks to the manager and all you wonderful staff for making our evening special x we will definitely be visiting again on our next visit to cape verde xxx

title: Afternoon lunch
text: I have got to say the best pub meal we have had in a long time x served hot with large portions of fresh veg x the service was excellent with friendly staff and making sure everything is ok x a lovely cosy atmosphere definitely worth a visit x we will be back to try some more homemade meals from your menu x

title: Evening meal
text: Just perfect lovely glass of white wine, food was large and hot freshly made and just so delious x staff were extremely friendly and we felt so relaxed x thanks for making our evening with you special x

title: Perfect
text: Lovely place to have a few cocktails and relax x the service was fantastic with friendly staff xx just go and chill x best cocktails ever xx thanks for making our evening special xx

title: Sunday roast
text: Absolutely amazing we just loved it x the food was hot and also had a lot of meat on our plates x tasty fresh vegetables and lovely thick gravey x we also loved the atmosphere and friendly staff x we will definitely be coming back x thanks for making our lunch relaxing x

title: Weekend break
text: A pleasant hotel with friendly staff x if you turn right and then first left out of the hotel a 10 min walk you have all the excellent bars and resturants we both felt safe in the area x The room was small but had everything you needed and was cleaned with fresh towels everyday x I would recommend this hotel for a visit to the city .A safe and extra pillows in the cupboard breakfast was ok and had a lovely view of the acropolis x would be nice if it had a kettle with teas and coffee xx thanks for making our stay relaxing x

title: Acropolis
text: Amazing we spent 3 hours walking around and as we had already got our tickets didn't have to queue up x it was busy but as we didn't go in a group we could go back to area's when they were less crowded x

title: Excellent veiw
text: We decided to come here for a few drinks you have to go up in a very small lift x the staff were friendly but we had to wait a long time before we got a table even though most of the tables had reserved on them and still had it on them when we left x we did find the bar relaxing so I would recommend x

title: Afternoon relaxation
text: We got the vouiliagmeni line blue bus down from the city and spent a few hours chilling a very busy place lots of sunbeds but very close to each other was €15 each to get in x the water was lovely and refreshing fabulous for a swim x very pretty with lots of fish that like to nibble your toes x the restaurant looked nice and friendly staff around x my skin felt so soft after x a must visit.

title: Passing by
text: We stopped here for a drink before getting on the bus back to the city mist say lovely atmosphere and fabulous music x we wanted to order food but it was so busy we had to wait a while before we got served and didn't want to rush x the food looked delicious x if you have time a must visit x

title: Perfect
text: We stopped in here for a few drinks a couple of time on our way back to our hotel after a busy day touring the city x was just perfect x staff friendly fabulous music lots of tasty olives x drinks good and my partner love it x thanks for making our evenings so special x

title: Interesting
text: We spent 40 mins looking around this site with friendly staff inside the museum x nice to sit on the seats around the ground and smell the pine and watch the birds very interesting read around each area x also a lovely church you can visit x would definitely recommend the €30 seven sites ticket x

title: Evening drinks
text: Fabulous xx what a amazing place to chill and have a few cocktails in the evening x we come here a few times as the service was so good and I just loved the cocktails xx great music and even gave us a lovely selection of snacks to dibble on xx thanks for making our evenings so special xx we will most definitely be coming back x

title: Lunch
text: Just the best x good value for money the salad was so fresh and everything just tasted delicious x I would say this is a must if in Eastbourne you will not be disappointed xx

title: Take away
text: We ordered a take away and picked it up half hour later x it was busy and our food wasn't ready so was offered a drink the resturant had a lovely atmosphere and all the staff were friendly xx on the way home the food smelt so good and oh my goodness when we eat it I must say it was the best Indian food I have ever had xxx it's a must x I can't wait to go again xx superb xxx

title: Spot of lunch x
text: A lovely place to enjoy a meal and the sunshine x excellent food good value for money large portions and a friendly atmosphere xx

title: Perfect
text: What a fabulous place to chill for a evening meal x everything was perfect x service food and atmosphere x we just loved it and will definitely recommend to our friends x thanks for making our evening special xx

title: Perfect
text: What a lovely little find x we were looking for a pub that did Sunday roast and stopped here x so glad we did the service was spot on and food delicious x best roast potatoes and huge Yorkshire pudding with a lovely homemade creamy horseradish sauce x also the vegetables were crispy and fresh x a must for a relaxing afternoon x thanks to the chef and staff for making our afternoon chilled x

title: Breakfast
text: We stopped here on our way to the coast for a spot of breakfast x I'm so glad we did it was delicious food was hot and you had lots of food to choose from x service was excellent my only issue was the pot of tea wasn't hot x but I would definitely go back as everyone made us feel welcome xx

title: Evening meal
text: Lovely resturant to have a meal and watch the sun go down x a extremely friendly family run restaurant x food was delicious and excellent prices good wine and tasty warm bread x I will be visiting again on my next trip to Cyprus x thanks for making our evening relaxing xx

title: The best
text: Come here one morning after walking round the tomb of the kings x friendly clean and had a fabulous atmosphere x food was hot and tasty x would definitely come here if you love your English breakfast xx
